column2: The [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionFocus] focused faction of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! seeks to [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionGoal].
GOAL SUCCESS! The [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionFocus] focused faction of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has §Gaccomplished§! the goal: [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionGoal].
GOAL FAILURE! The [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionFocus] focused faction of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has §Rfailed! the goal: [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionGoal].
